Package at.htl.timetableGenerator.output

Class TimetablePrinter

java.lang.Object
at.htl.timetableGenerator.output.TimetablePrinter
public final class TimetablePrinter extends Object
Utility class for printing a timetable in a formatted manner.

      Parameters:
      width - The total width to center the string within.
      stringToCenter - The string to center.
      Returns:
